result.eng: A lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ga: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.orig: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.html: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidhA lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an-ċuid daoine ag teaċt anseo i riṫ an tsaṁraiḋA lot of people come here in the summer.

result.eng: She runs in the park every morning.
result.ga: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.orig: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.html: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidinShe runs in the park every morning.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí ag riṫ sa ṗáirc gaċ maidinShe runs in the park every morning.

result.html: I rith na CáscaDuring Easter.
result.ponchtml: I riṫ na CáscaDuring Easter.

result.html: I rith na seachtaineDuring the week.
result.ponchtml: I riṫ na seaċtaineDuring the week.

result.eng: He had many jobs during that time.
result.ga: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an ama
result.orig: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an ama
result.html: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an amaHe had many jobs during that time.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí post a ḃí aige i riṫ an amaHe had many jobs during that time.

result.eng: The rain will spread east during the day.
result.ga: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.orig: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.html: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.
result.ponchtml: Leaṫfaiḋ an ḃáisteaċ soir i riṫ an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.

result.html: Rith sé isteach sa seomraHe ran into the room.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ sé isteaċ sa seomraHe ran into the room.

result.ga: Tá an páiste ag rith
result.html: Tá an páiste ag rithThe child is running.
result.ponchtml: Tá an páiste ag riṫThe child is running.

result.eng: I play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.
result.ga: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarma
result.orig: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarma
result.html: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarmaI play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.
result.ponchtml: Imrím leadóg 'ċuile Aoine i riṫ an téarmaI play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.

result.eng: The cat ran under the gate.
result.html: Rith an cat faoin ngeataThe cat ran under the gate.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ an cat faoin ngeataThe cat ran under the gate.

result.html: Téim ag rithI go running.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag riṫI go running.

result.eng: I go running and swimming every day.
result.ga: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach lá
result.orig: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach lá
result.html: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach láI go running and swimming every day.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag riṫ agus ag snáṁ gaċ láI go running and swimming every day.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
